entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
